name: [Absorb] Igor Bartali's Black Spirit
description:
Igor Bartali said the dark power is resonating to find its owner. Accept it if you're ready, but if not, you'll end up paying the price.
Decide whether or not you want to accept its power and talk to Igor Bartali.
story:
That piece of jewel in your hand!
Wh-where did you find it?
It's making me nostalgic,
however, I do not want it.
I am now old and frail.
Its power will take control of me.
Perhaps it's fate that you're the one who found it...
If you'd like, the power within this pendant
can be transferred to your Black Spirit.
But remember this.
That power won't always be beneficial for you.

Gaining power will make you happy during that moment.
However, remember, that power won't always be beneficial for you.

I'll ask you one last time, Player!!
Are you sure you won't regret making this decision?
